title: FS: PC760 Rose Co. Rube Waddell
author: Kris19

posts.post_title: FS: PC760 Rose Co. Rube Waddell
posts.post_content:
Extremely rare Rose Co. PC of HOFer Rube Waddell, PSA 4.  This is only the third graded by SGC or PSA.  

Please PM or email me at [url]kris.sweckard@sbcglobal.net[/url] to discuss price or for better photos (sorry for the small front here, I can't figure out how to enlarge it).

Thanks!
Kris
